sourcesContent: import{formatEther as e,formatUnits as r}from"viem";function n(e){return e?`${e.slice(0,5)}…${e.slice(-4)}`:""}function t({wei:r,precision:n=3}){return parseFloat(e(r)).toFixed(n).replace(/0+$/,"").replace(/\.$/,"")}function i({amount:e,decimals:n}){return r(BigInt(e),n)}function o({lamports:e}){return r(e,9)}export{o as formatLamportsAmount,i as formatTokenAmount,n as formatWalletAddress,t as formatWeiAmount};
